abstract.t: This document specifies a protocol that allows routing IP datagramsto a mobile host. The protocol is intended to provide local mobilityand handoff support. It can interwork with Mobile IP [1] to providewide area mobility support. Four fundamental design principles ofthe protocol are: (1) location information is stored in distributeddata bases (2) location information referring to a mobile host iscreated and updated by regular IP datagrams originated by the saidmobile host (3) location information is stored as soft state (4)location management for idle mobile hosts is separated from locationmanagement of hosts that are actively transmitting or receiving data.
